basics.name: Yiou Chen
basics.label: Frontend engineer
basics.objective: Looking for front end engineering opportunies in Greater New York area
basics.summary: Frontend engineer at Veeva Systems in Pleasanton, CA. Working in UIPlatform team. Doing JavaScript stuff.

work.summary: I work in the UIPlatform team for Veeva Vault. Our objective is to improve the foundation of our enterprise application using the latest technologies and best practices.
highlights: Created a runtime architecture for a domain specific language using JavaScript.
Designed a suite of routing utilities for managing front end routing of our single page app.
Evaluated and integrated various UI development tools such as package-lock, prettier, storybook.
Rebuilt login/password reset flow using React, Redux, Redux Thunk.

work.summary: I worked in a small fast-paced technology incubator. We experimented with various technologies and turned clients' idea into working prototype. As one of the frontend engineers in the team, I have experienced with Angular, React, Polymer, D3 and so on.
highlights: Developed customizable data visualization components using D3.js and Angular 2
Maintained a Angular UI component library
Developed a search engine front end using Angular 2
Created and integrated a map widget that handled high-volume real-time data using leaflet

education.summary: I majored in Computer Science, minored in Digital art. In college, I studied various topics in computer science, including database design, system programming, network programming, computer graphics, etc. I graduated from the Computer Science Honor Program with Summa Cum Laude designation.
